basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A highly skilled and versatile Software Engineer with experience in full-stack development, AI/Machine Learning, and DevOps practices.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Collaborated as a core member of a small development team to build the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform.
highlights: Architect and developed key dashboard and form components for campaign management
Implemented responsive design principles and ensured cross-browser compatibility
Worked closely with the back-end team on system design and API integration

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led the frontend refactoring of an exam management platform and engineered an AI-powered browser extension.
highlights: Improved user experience and page load times by approximately 25%
Developed RoboGPT, an Nvidia Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language commands

projects.name: Otis - Customer Support Automation Tool
projects.description: An internal tool that automated form-filling and email generation for customer support
